Description_lang: Increases the damage of $?a445465[Wither][Immolate] by $s1% and its duration by ${$s3/1000} sec.

description_blz.en_US: Increases the damage of Immolate by 25% and its duration by 3 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Aumenta un 25% el daño de Inmolar y 3 s su duración.
description_blz.pt_BR: Aumenta em 25% o dano de Imolar e a duração em 3 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht den Schaden von 'Feuerbrand' um 25% und die Dauer um 3 Sek.
description_blz.en_GB: Increases the damage of Immolate by 25% and its duration by 3 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Aumenta un 25% el daño de Inmolar y 3 s su duración.
description_blz.fr_FR: Augmente les dégâts d’Immolation de 25 % et sa durée de 3 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta i danni inflitti da Immolazione del 25% e la sua durata di 3 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: Урон от "Жертвенного огня" увеличивается на 25%, а его время действия – на 3 сек.
description_blz.zh_TW: 獻祭的傷害提高25%，持續時間延長3秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 献祭的伤害提高25%，持续时间延长3秒。
